title: The Way Station
description: Roland's pursuit of the elusive Man in Black across the endless Mohaine desert becomes even more treacherous when he is attacked by a ravenous pack of desert dogs and vampiric dust devils when he is at his weakest! It's a new chapter in the life of the last gunslinger of Gilead as he struggles to remain alive and achieve his destiny! Don't miss the wonders of: the Way Station!COLLECTING: DARK TOWER: THE GUNSLINGER - THE WAY STATION 1-5
author: Robin Furth
